channel.title: Posts on Carl's Big Giant Dorky Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Carl's Big Giant Dorky Homepage

item.title: It Worked
item.description: Well hey look it worked! That’s pretty rad. I don’t have a lot to add to this, mostly this post is to make sure the script that I wrote to autobuild and commit to [GitHub](git commit -a –allow-empty-message) works =)

item.title: It Is Alive
item.description: Hello World! It’s been a while since I did anything with this site. I finally got around to building something with Hugo. I kind of dig the idea of a static site generator but I generally run Windows machines so it was kind of a pain in the ass. I finally got around to installing Linux Mint on a virtual machine so now it was much easier to check out.
